content: Sporting event delegation **[Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)** participated in the [1958 Asian Games](/wiki/1958_Asian_Games) held in [Tokyo](/wiki/Tokyo), [Japan](/wiki/Japan) from May 24 to June 1, 1958. The country ranked 11th with a gold, silver, and bronze medal. ## Medalists MedalNameSportEvent Gold[Tan Howe Liang](/wiki/Tan_Howe_Liang) [Weightlifting](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games)[Men's lightweight (67.5 kg)](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games_-_Men%27s_67.5_kg) Silver[Lionel Chee](/wiki/Lionel_Chee) Gan Eng Guan [Gan Eng Teck](/wiki/Gan_Eng_Teck) Andrew Lim Barry Mitchell Derek Mitchell [Tan Eng Bock](/wiki/Tan_Eng_Bock) Tan Eng Liang [Thio Gim Hock](/wiki/Thio_Gim_Hock) [Eric Yeo](/wiki/Eric_Yeo) [Water polo](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_1958_Asian_Games)[Men's Team](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_1958_Asian_Games) BronzeAustin Dunsford [Boxing](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1958_Asian_Games)[Men's Featherweight (57 kg)](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1958_Asian_Games) ## Medal summary ### Medal table SportGoldSilverBronzeTotal [Weightlifting](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games)1001 [Water polo](/wiki/Water_polo_at_the_1958_Asian_Games)0101 [Boxing](/wiki/Boxing_at_the_1958_Asian_Games)0011Totals (3 entries)1113 ## Weightlifting ### Men's AthleteEventClean & PressSnatchClean & JerkTotalResultResultRankResultRankResultRankOw Fook Seng[Men's 52 kg](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games_-_Men%27s_52_kg)85.0275.07105.03265.0**5**[Chua Phung Kim](/wiki/Chua_Phung_Kim)[Men's 56 kg](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games_-_Men%27s_56_kg)87.5590.05117.5â€”N/aNM**DNF**[Tan Ser Cher](/wiki/Tan_Ser_Cher)[Men's 60 kg](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games_-_Men%27s_60_kg)100.0492.55132.52325.0**4**[Tan Howe Liang](/wiki/Tan_Howe_Liang)[Men's 67.5 kg](/wiki/Weightlifting_at_the_1958_Asian_Games_-_Men%27s_67.5_kg)110.04112.51152.51375.0 This [Asian Games](/wiki/Asian_Games) article is a stub.
